scripts.clean: git clean -xdf; rm -rf package-lock.json; npm install
scripts.clean:all: for dir in tests/*/; do (echo 'clean' $dir; cd $dir && npm run clean && npm test); done
scripts.clean:test:all: for dir in tests/*/; do (echo 'clean & test' $dir; cd $dir && npm run clean && npm test); done
scripts.clean:test:copy: cd tests/rollup-plugin-copy-test && npm run clean && npm test
scripts.clean:test:cem: cd tests/rollup-plugin-cem-test && npm run clean && npm test
scripts.clean:test:tsc: cd tests/rollup-plugin-tsc-test && npm run clean && npm test
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run check:fix && npm run format && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: for dir in tests/*/; do (echo 'test' $dir; cd $dir && npm test); done
